Error.ServerError: Server Error. Please try to scan again.
Error.NoInterNetText: Please check your internet connection and try again.
Error.NoCameraText: To continue, please enable camera access in Settings.

ErrorPage.OnlyValidText: The SMART Health Card Verifier App only verifies SMART Health Cards® for COVID-19 vaccination and test records.

Welcome.Title: Welcome!
Welcome.VerifySmartHealthCard: Verify SMART® Health Card QR codes in a safe and privacy-preserving way
Welcome.HowTo: How to verify SMART® Health Cards

Scan.CameraPermissionText: This app uses the camera to scan QR codes with COVID-19 vaccine certificates. This allows verifiers to verify the authenticity of COVID-19 vaccine certificates presented to them.

Result.NotVerifiedText: This SMART Health Card cannot be verified. It may have been corrupted.
Result.PartialVerifiedText: The SMART® Health Card is valid, but the issuer is not in the CommonTrust Network's registry of trusted issuers.
Result.Name: Name
Result.AlwaysVerify: Always verify identity with a government-issued I.D.

LabResult.title: Test Result
LabResult.CollectedTimeNotFound: The QR code only provided a date of collection, not a time. In this case, we assume the time to be 00:00 GMT.

WelcomeDialog.Welcome:
Welcome to the
SMART Health Card
Verifier App
WelcomeDialog.WelcomeDescription1: Use this app to verify the SMART Health Cards of your customers or employees at your business.
WelcomeDialog.WelcomeDescription2: This app does not save or store your digital credentials.
WelcomeDialog.WelcomeInner1Verified: The SMART Health Card is valid and issued by a provider in the CommonTrust Network.
WelcomeDialog.WelcomeInner1PartiallyVerified: The SMART Health Card is valid but is not issued by a provider in the CommonTrust Network. Proceed with caution.
WelcomeDialog.NotVerifiedWelcomeDialog: The SMART Health Card could not be verified. It may have been corrupted or tampered with.
WelcomeDialog.WelcomeInner1Description1: Scan a SMART Health Card and one of three results will appear:
WelcomeDialog.WelcomeInner2Description1: Scanning a SMART Health Card will show the type of record and relevant information
WelcomeDialog.WelcomeInner3Description: Always verify identity of the SMART Health Card holder with a government-issued I.D.
